title: The Life of a Fireman - the Night Alarm. 'Start Her Lively, Boys.'
provenance_text:
Charles J. Rosenbloom [1898-1973], Pittsburgh, PA (Lugt Suppl. 633b), until April 1, 1973; his bequest to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, February 1974.

Under review by CGK.
